articles.description: Experts are still studying how good COVID-19 vaccines are at preventing people from spreading the virus, but say the risk is low.
articles.content:
NEW YORK Can I still spread the coronavirus after Im vaccinated?
Its possible. Experts say the risk is low, but are still studying how well the shots blunt the spread of the virus.
